entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 13 except 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 this afternoon. High 13 except 8 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:42 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 12:42 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023
